title: internal/app/app.go
subtitle: Application Core - Orchestration Layer
description:
Note: The App struct serves as the orchestration layer, coordinating all major components: worker pool, signal handling, and shutdown management. It follows the composition pattern where each component is independently testable and replaceable.

Component Composition

  • • Worker: Task execution engine
  • • Shutdown Manager: Graceful termination
  • • Signal Handler: OS signal processing
  • • WaitGroup: Goroutine synchronization

Key Methods

  • • New(): Constructor with DI
  • • Run(): Main orchestration loop
  • • cleanup(): Resource cleanup hook

Shutdown Sequence: Signal → Context Cancel → Shutdown Initiation → Worker Stop → WaitGroup Wait → Cleanup → Exit
author: A.M.Hamidipour
